Hi everyone,

I'm working on a proof by induction where the base case isn't 0, but I'm struggling to adjust the induction process accordingly. Is there a recommended way in Lean to modify or shift the base case to start from a different number (e.g., 2)?

Thanks in advance!
Hi there. Including a #mwe is usually helpful (that's a link you can click). But you might be looking for docs#Nat.le_induction
Sarah Azevedo Pereira has marked this topic as resolved.
